bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of an inversion of the nose beam resulting from a fracture of the nasal bone. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 13: 大風惡疾，雙眼昏，咫尺不辨人物，髪眉自落，鼻梁崩倒，肌 膚瘡如苔蘚，勢若不救 , “In the case of the malign ailment of massive wind, vision of both eyes is dimmed. One cannot recognize others even at a very close distance. The hair and the eyebrows fall off by themselves. The nose beam collapses . The skin develops sores as if this were moss. It appears as if no intervention could bring relief”.
